data.text:
Yaeno Muteki was troubled about being unable to 
control her emotions during races. In regards 
to thinking of a countermeasure for her――
data.processed:
<story>Yaeno Muteki was troubled about being unable to 
<story>control her emotions during races. In regards 
<story>to thinking of a countermeasure for her――

data.text: Actually, there was one thing I had in mind that might work.
data.processed: <story>Actually, there was one thing I had in mind that might work.

data.text: ……『I want to know more about the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu』, is it？
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>……『I want to know more about the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu』, is it？

data.text:
She was pretty wild when she was younger. The day I met her too, 
she was practicing Kata in order help keep her emotions in check 
during the Selection Race.
data.processed:
<story>She was pretty wild when she was younger. The day I met her too, 
<story>she was practicing Kata in order help keep her emotions in check 
<story>during the Selection Race.

data.text:
Up until now those unruly instincts of hers―― without a doubt, 
must have been held in check by this 『Ardent Flame』 and the 
teachings of the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu.
data.processed:
<story>Up until now those unruly instincts of hers―― without a doubt, 
<story>must have been held in check by this 『Ardent Flame』 and the 
<story>teachings of the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu.

data.text:
So, in other words, in regards to controlling the 
『Ardent Flame』 during a race, within the Kongou 
Yaegaki Ryuu, you believe there is a hint？
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>So, in other words, in regards to controlling the 
<story>『Ardent Flame』 during a race, within the Kongou 
<story>Yaegaki Ryuu, you believe there is a hint？

data.text: ……that seems reasonable. Well then――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>……that seems reasonable. Well then――

data.text:
Instructor, assistant instructor. I have returned. For today, 
thank you kindly for your guidance.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Instructor, assistant instructor. I have returned. For today, 
<story>thank you kindly for your guidance.

data.text:
Welcome, thank you for coming, Trainer-san. Please feel free to 
ask anything about the teachings of the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandmother
data.processed:
<story>Welcome, thank you for coming, Trainer-san. Please feel free to 
<story>ask anything about the teachings of the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu.

data.text:
Seeing is believing…… by all means, today, 
make the most of this experience
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandmother
data.processed:
<story>Seeing is believing…… by all means, today, 
<story>make the most of this experience

data.text: And, with that said……！
data.processed: <story>And, with that said……！

data.text: Sei！ ……Haa！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Sei！ ……Haa！！

data.text:
Yes, just like that. Now, step and lean forward to match with 
your fist. Rather than lifting your head, it should feel more 
like you're being pulled along.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandmother
data.processed:
<story>Yes, just like that. Now, step and lean forward to match with 
<story>your fist. Rather than lifting your head, it should feel more 
<story>like you're being pulled along.

data.text:
Yaeno, lower your hips more！！ 
With a sharper swing, once more！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed:
<story>Yaeno, lower your hips more！！ 
<story>With a sharper swing, once more！

data.text: Yes！ Thank you！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Yes！ Thank you！！

data.text:
While it was extremely simple sounding, together with Yaeno 
Muteki, I trained by performing the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu Kata.
data.processed:
<story>While it was extremely simple sounding, together with Yaeno 
<story>Muteki, I trained by performing the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu Kata.

data.text:
……that said, moving around in a way I wasn't accustomed to 
depleted my stamina a lot quicker than I expected. After that, I 
ended up just observing, that's when――
data.processed:
<story>……that said, moving around in a way I wasn't accustomed to 
<story>depleted my stamina a lot quicker than I expected. After that, I 
<story>ended up just observing, that's when――

data.text: Do you have a moment？
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed: <story>Do you have a moment？

data.text:
It seems that the guidance was left to the assistant instructor, 
his wife, as the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu instructor―― Yaeno Muteki's 
grandfather, quietly started a conversation.
data.processed:
<story>It seems that the guidance was left to the assistant instructor, 
<story>his wife, as the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu instructor―― Yaeno Muteki's 
<story>grandfather, quietly started a conversation.

data.text: ……for being concerned about my granddaughter, I'm grateful.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed: <story>……for being concerned about my granddaughter, I'm grateful.

data.text:
Most people―― in regards to races, are perplexed by 
their own 『Ardent Flame』, and are often seeking out 
that 『Tranquil Water』, what do you think?
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed:
<story>Most people―― in regards to races, are perplexed by 
<story>their own 『Ardent Flame』, and are often seeking out 
<story>that 『Tranquil Water』, what do you think?

data.text:
Aah, as I thought. ……her movements are stiff. Her follow-through 
is shallow. From Yaeno, right now, I can sense a feeling of fear.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed:
<story>Aah, as I thought. ……her movements are stiff. Her follow-through 
<story>is shallow. From Yaeno, right now, I can sense a feeling of fear.

data.text:
The 『Ardent Flame』, it must be because she's been continuously 
troubled by them, but she has been fixating on the 『Tranquil 
Water』 too much. ……However, Trainer-san.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed:
<story>The 『Ardent Flame』, it must be because she's been continuously 
<story>troubled by them, but she has been fixating on the 『Tranquil 
<story>Water』 too much. ……However, Trainer-san.

data.text: ――『The Fusion of Fire and Water, Becomes A Safeguard』
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed: <story>――『The Fusion of Fire and Water, Becomes A Safeguard』

data.text:
The Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu is a style that attaches great importance 
to protection. These words represent the essential understanding 
required to realize that protection.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed:
<story>The Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu is a style that attaches great importance 
<story>to protection. These words represent the essential understanding 
<story>required to realize that protection.

data.text:
Being like the 『Ardent Flame』 is not limited to 
having an intense fighting spirit, without the 
will to protect, it can easily collapse.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed:
<story>Being like the 『Ardent Flame』 is not limited to 
<story>having an intense fighting spirit, without the 
<story>will to protect, it can easily collapse.

data.text:
In the same vein, the 『Tranquil Water』 is not limited to a serene 
reasonableness, which leads to hesitation in the face of 
hardship, resulting in being one step too late to protect……――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed:
<story>In the same vein, the 『Tranquil Water』 is not limited to a serene 
<story>reasonableness, which leads to hesitation in the face of 
<story>hardship, resulting in being one step too late to protect……――

data.text:
『The Fusion of Fire and Water』 is, the balance between the 
『Ardent Flame』 and 『Tranquil Water』, so that when the time comes, 
one can protect without hesitation.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed:
<story>『The Fusion of Fire and Water』 is, the balance between the 
<story>『Ardent Flame』 and 『Tranquil Water』, so that when the time comes, 
<story>one can protect without hesitation.

data.text:
For our style, we perform the 『Kata』 to cleanse the mind and 
body, in order to facilitate 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed:
<story>For our style, we perform the 『Kata』 to cleanse the mind and 
<story>body, in order to facilitate 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』.

data.text:
――have you understood it so far？ To control the 『Ardent Flames』 
does not mean, use the 『Tranquil Water』 to restrain it, it does 
not mean to drown it out.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed:
<story>――have you understood it so far？ To control the 『Ardent Flames』 
<story>does not mean, use the 『Tranquil Water』 to restrain it, it does 
<story>not mean to drown it out.

data.text:
Whether it be martial arts or a race, it is the same. The aim 
should be 『Fusion』. In what way should that be realized……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki's Grandfather
data.processed:
<story>Whether it be martial arts or a race, it is the same. The aim 
<story>should be 『Fusion』. In what way should that be realized……

data.text:
During a race, how to realize 『The Fusion 
of Fire and Water』…… is it? I see――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>During a race, how to realize 『The Fusion 
<story>of Fire and Water』…… is it? I see――

data.text:
I have spoken with my grandfather about this before, 
however, in regards to the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu, 
we use the 『Kata』 to realize this.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>I have spoken with my grandfather about this before, 
<story>however, in regards to the Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu, 
<story>we use the 『Kata』 to realize this.

data.text: In that case, what would the 『Kata』 be for a race……？
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>In that case, what would the 『Kata』 be for a race……？

data.text:
For martial arts, 『Kata』 are based on hypothetical conditions and 
opponents, much like a simulation to choose the most optimal 
action to undertake.
data.processed:
<story>For martial arts, 『Kata』 are based on hypothetical conditions and 
<story>opponents, much like a simulation to choose the most optimal 
<story>action to undertake.

data.text:
If one were to adapt these for the purpose of a race, then the 
thing that comes to mind is――
data.processed:
<story>If one were to adapt these for the purpose of a race, then the 
<story>thing that comes to mind is――

data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>……！！

data.text:
That's right……！ To surpass the opponents, the 『Ardent Flame』！ To 
calmly analyze and grasp the situation, the 『Tranquil Water』！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>That's right……！ To surpass the opponents, the 『Ardent Flame』！ To 
<story>calmly analyze and grasp the situation, the 『Tranquil Water』！！

data.text:
To combine these two, a 『Kata』―― With consideration for both the 
settings and conditions, a variety of 『Tactics』……！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>To combine these two, a 『Kata』―― With consideration for both the 
<story>settings and conditions, a variety of 『Tactics』……！

data.text:
In other words, for a race 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』 can be 
realized, by learning many different 『Tactics』……！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>In other words, for a race 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』 can be 
<story>realized, by learning many different 『Tactics』……！！

data.text: I now have a guiding light. In that case, what I need next is――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>I now have a guiding light. In that case, what I need next is――

data.text: ……an expert familiar with this road, that can instruct me.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>……an expert familiar with this road, that can instruct me.

data.text:
Those with the title of trainer are, in regards to race tactics, 
considered those most proficient at it.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Those with the title of trainer are, in regards to race tactics, 
<story>considered those most proficient at it.

data.text:
Please, for just a little while longer, consider accompanying 
someone as immature as I.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Please, for just a little while longer, consider accompanying 
<story>someone as immature as I.

data.text:
The 『Kata』 for races…… in other words, the many 『Tactics』, please 
instruct me on them！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: Got it, leave it to me！
Got it, leave it to me！

data.processed:
<story>The 『Kata』 for races…… in other words, the many 『Tactics』, please 
<story>instruct me on them！

data.text:
Thank you very much. ……a response overflowing 
in sincerity―― it's very reassuring.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Thank you very much. ……a response overflowing 
<story>in sincerity―― it's very reassuring.

data.text:
Will Yaeno Muteki be able to realize 『The Fusion 
of Fire and Water』 using tactics for a race？ ……The 
first step is to instruct her properly！
data.processed:
<story>Will Yaeno Muteki be able to realize 『The Fusion 
<story>of Fire and Water』 using tactics for a race？ ……The 
<story>first step is to instruct her properly！
